original: Listen to him. He's a doctor.

"You see those chubby kids all the time, scarcely able to lift that last bacon-cheeseburger to their blubbery jowls. At Eugenics Incorporated International, we design perfect babies, but perfect babies can grow into imperfect adults. I recommend that my clients give Lipurgex to their bundle of joy at 2 years old, when obesity starts. You're never too young to start."
translated: 「看看那些小胖子，手里的最后一个培根芝士堡几乎举不到层次分明的下巴上面。在优基因国际公司，我们能够打造完美的婴儿，但再完美的婴儿都有可能长成不完美的大人。我强烈建议优基因的客户在孩子两岁时就给他服用Lipurgex，因为这是肥胖的萌芽期。减肥永远都不嫌早。」

original: Why risk having a fat child?
translated: 何必冒着生出胖子的风险呢？
